hibernate-mapping.query: FROM com.ff.domain.business.CustomerTypeDO customerTypeDO WHERE customerTypeDO.customerTypeCode IN (SELECT accountGroup.customerGroup FROM com.ff.domain.ratemanagement.masters.AccountGroupSapDO accountGroup WHERE accountGroup.rateCustomerCategoryId.rateCustomerCategoryId = ( SELECT rateCustomerCategoryDO.rateCustomerCategoryId FROM com.ff.domain.ratemanagement.masters.RateCustomerCategoryDO rateCustomerCategoryDO WHERE rateCustomerCategoryDO.rateCustomerCategoryCode =:customerCode ) )
